column5: I will be spending a week in Quebec,the last week in august.Can anyone give me info on presentations on fishing speckled & lake trout,I will be flying out 3 of the 5 days for walleye & pike, but 2 days I will be on a lake with trout.Any info would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance Ed
It would be easier to help if you would specify what region of Qu√©bec you will be visiting.
